data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a dry northeast monsoon, the weather will be mainly fine, and warm during the day over the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. A cold front is expected to reach the coast of Guangdong Monday night to early Tuesday. Under the influence of the associated intense northeast monsoon and a broad band of clouds, it will be windy and becoming appreciably cooler over the region midweek next week, and cold over inland areas. With the monsoon moderating slightly in the latter part of next week, temperatures over the coast of southern China will rise gradually.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251116","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods in the morning.
